welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elias Fausto, Brazil! Get ready to be enchanted by our city's charming streets, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that Elias Fausto has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
